file_content.text: You've actually found me? I'm impressed!
Let's make this a battle for me to remember you by!
Become the worthy challenge I know you can be!
You thought me a mere spy, but I'm so much more!
Is that the best you can muster? You disappoint me!
Even as you strike me down, I endure!
I believe I've already found my next challenge. Too soon to look ahead? Perhaps. But, frankly, I'm bored now.
It's probably because you've been cheating--using my former lieutenant and my own equipment to come after me. Hardly impressive. Tell Evie Bo I say... hello.
It's probably because you've been using an SIS agent and my own equipment to come after me. Deena Riss has given you a leg up, cheater.
It's official: you've gotten on my nerves. Congratulations. You must be so very proud.
Know this: when the galaxy sees my plan in all its glory, and that you tried and failed to stop it, you'll become a corpse. And I'll remain a legend.
I've recently taken to reading some heavily-encrypted reports. You've been busy. Made powerful friends, powerful enemies. I've underestimated you. It won't happen again.
However--know that no matter how deep you dig and how much you find, you won't stop me. But you will make your most powerful enemy yet.
Whatever your cause in all this, you should know that it means nothing to me. What I do, I do to prove that I can--without being caught.
If my threat before was too subtle, understand this: anyone who's ever tried to capture me has met with a most violent end.
If you're surprised to hear me on a secured channel, then it's clear you have no idea who you're dealing with.
I strongly suggest you stop looking into my affairs. Or keep looking, I suppose. You won't get far.
You're not in my employ. How very curious.
I did anticipate outside interference--but nothing quite so meager. It would appear I've concerned myself over nothing.
Well. I won't keep you from... whatever it is you believe you're accomplishing. Carry on.
So that's the Shroud. Can't believe he actually spoke to you. He's not exactly the type to poke his head out....
That was him on holo. The Shroud. Didn't expect him to be onto us so soon-- Ah, don't matter. Just gotta work faster.
Well, this is telling--your transmission contains a structural assessment of government installations on Coruscant. That's certainly in line with what we've learned so far.
I'll have my people check on those locations. Meanwhile, I've got a list of relay points these files passed through. That'll help us get at more data. Updating coordinates....
Let's see what you scored us. Old dossiers, old invoices and... an Imperial report: "Dromund Kaas Structural Integrity Assessment." Gotta be the inspiration for his attack on Kaas.
Got relay specs connecting it to other files. That's it--we're on the scent. Got the new coordinates plugged in. Good hunting.
Oh, hello. I suppose you think you've got me, now that you've made it into my facility.
Well, think again. It's a very large facility--with an even larger welcoming committee!
This is most unfortunate--for you, I mean.
I'm the only one who's ever stood in this control room without being carried out in pieces.
That said, I do hope you like the place. You may even get to watch my plan come to its fruition--if you survive that long.
After all you've been through, did you really think I wouldn't have a surprise or two waiting for you here?
No, no--you don't want to bother with that....
Oh--now where will you go, hmm?
